name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Addison F. TOLLEN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing v. Tollen

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Addison F. TOLLEN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 31st day of March, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is denied in accordance with this Court’s decision in Sullivan v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, — Pa. -, 708 A.2d 481 (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Addison F. TOLLEN, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 31, 1998.
